text: Dreamtime is the ninth studio album by English rock band The Stranglers. It was released on 27 October, 1986 through Epic Records. It went to number 16 in the United Kingdom, number 172 in the United States, number 45 in New Zealand, number 64 in Australia, number 83 in Canada and number 60 in the Netherlands. ==Track listing== ;Notes *"Norman Normal" is an Aural Sculpture outtake. The rest of the bonus tracks were recorded for Dreamtime. *The instrumental track "Burnham Beeches" was originally intended as the B-side to the abandoned "Was it You?" single. ==References== Category:The Stranglers albums Category:1986 albums
title: Dreamtime (The Stranglers album)
